title: WearTools Pro for Android Wear
summary: Use Android Wear Watch control your phone to call friends, send SMS and more...
developerAddress:
No. 51, YuanMingYuan Xi Road, Haidian Dist
Beijing, China
description: Use Wear Tools Pro with your Android Wear Watch to control your phone to:* Make phone call to your family and friends* Send SMS with your config number and message by one click on your Watch* Take Photo* Record audio and play the record audio * Turn Flashlight on / off * Change music/ring/notification volume* Make your phone vibrate * Find your phone by Sound and Vibrate* Make your phone speak/read text for you ( Your phone need support TTS and download the TTS language package. The first time of start TTS will take several seconds, so please wait it initialized. )* And more will coming soon...Control your Mac from your Android Wear Watch with Quick Remote Mac Server: http://qr.woiapp.comTips: You can create menu for group actions to quickly access them and find them. Long touch on the item to delete or rename it.
descriptionHTML:
Use Wear Tools Pro with your Android Wear Watch to control your phone to:

* Make phone call to your family and friends
* Send SMS with your config number and message by one click on your Watch
* Take Photo
* Record audio and play the record audio
* Turn Flashlight on / off
* Change music/ring/notification volume
* Make your phone vibrate
* Find your phone by Sound and Vibrate
* Make your phone speak/read text for you ( Your phone need support TTS and download the TTS language package. The first time of start TTS will take several seconds, so please wait it initialized. )
* And more will coming soon...

Control your Mac from your Android Wear Watch with Quick Remote Mac Server: http://qr.woiapp.com

Tips: You can create menu for group actions to quickly access them and find them. Long touch on the item to delete or rename it.
recentChanges: - Super Charged with Quick Remote Mac Control: Now you can control your Mac from your Android Wear Watch directly. ( Download Free Quick Remote Mac Server from http://qr.woiapp.com )
